title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 103.5 - Multiple licensees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 103.5 - Multiple licensees

State Regulations
(a) In
order for a warehouse permit or a special retail warehouse permit to be issued
to a person holding more than one section 54 or 54-a license the following
criteria must be met: (1)

All licensees must
be under common ownership/control. Franchise operations where each license is
under a different ownership are not eligible. (2)

Accurate records must be maintained on
deliveries (brands, size, amount) made from the warehouse to individual
licensed premises. (b) If licensee does not possess a warehouse permit, all alcoholic beverages to be
sold at retail must be received from a wholesaler at and stored upon the
licensed premises from where they will be sold at retail. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
103.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
